q: what is the purpose of this work
pred: The purpose of this work is to showcase the process of changing a tire on a car. The video shows a man in a shop working on a car, changing the tire with the help of a jack and a tire iron. The video also shows the man putting the new tire on the car and tightening the lug nuts. This demonstrates the importance of proper tire maintenance and the necessary tools and skills required to change a tire safely and efficiently.
